title: WeatherApp
description: An app used to display current forecast of any city and its future forecast for the next 5 days

title: Mindfull
description: Mobile-design app focusing on productivity and personal growth for a healthy and stress-free lifestyle

title: Team-Profile
description: This app uses node.js to create a team of employees with a manager generated through command-line prompts

title: Readme-Generator

title: MusiXTube
description: This app allows music lovers to search for artist and play their favourite songs using YouTube API
